summary: REQ-2 appears implemented via DialogContent data-state animation classes, but REQ-1 is only gated by loginStatus (disabled state) and not explicitly by authentication/identity presence. Tailwind config changes include broad theming additions not requested by the BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: Attention pulse on Login button must run only when the user is unauthenticated (identity not present), and must not run after authentication.
missing_requirements.reason: LoginButton enables the pulse whenever loginStatus is not "logging-in" (i.e., whenever the button is not disabled). There is no explicit check for identity/authenticated state in this component, so the pulse is not guaranteed to be limited to unauthenticated users based on the shown changes.

The diff shows broad design-system/theme modifications in tailwind.config.js that are not required to satisfy those animation requirements.
